p:
In Seoul and Gyeonggi, the reproduction number is small due to the small number of general infections, and the t d is high (gentle descent) due to a long-term irregular small-scale spread. Using the reproduction equation (equation 6), it was found that the reproduction number and t d are inversely related (
R
0
S
‚àù 1/ t d ) regardless of the mass infection and the general infection. This implies that when sufficient COVID-19 infection data is available, the t d corresponding to the reproduction number can be deduced.
